name: BRAVO OMEGA
description:
Entry for the A Game By Its Cover Jam 2019, inspired by Arkotype's cover : https://famicase.com/19/softs/020.html

*****************

Quantum navigation simulation.

Navigate in the quantum space and find the breach to dive to the next quantum layer.

****************

CONTROLS :

Click + drag : Move around the center

Scroll forward (swiftly) : Dive

***************

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Mirage" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
